home.title: FAQ CENTER
home.subtitle: Everything you need to know about the platform!

tab1.question: How do I register?
tab1.answer: To register, start by choosing a unique username and verifying your email address, then create a secure password and click "Next" to continue. On the following screen, enter your full name, date of birth, and citizenship, making sure to accept the terms and conditions before clicking "Finish Registration." Finally, complete the process by uploading a clear selfie for identity verification to ensure your account is fully activated and ready for use.

tab2.question: Can I have more than one account?
tab2.answer: According to our terms and conditions, every player can create only one account with his personal details.

tab1.question: How do I place a bet in the Sport section?
tab1.answer: To place a bet on our platform, go to the Sports section. Choose your preferred event and select the odds for the outcome you want to bet on — it will automatically appear in your bet slip. Next, enter the amount you wish to wager and click "Place Bet" to confirm.

tab2.question: Why can't I place a bet on a specific event?
tab2.answer: The markets for certain events may be temporarily locked due to changes in the odds. Because of this, it might be temporarily unavailable to place a bet on that particular event.

tab3.question: What is "Cash Out"?
tab3.answer: This feature allows you to settle your bet for a certain amount before the event you wagered on has finished. The Cash Out option may not always be available during the entire match, as its availability depends on factors such as changing odds or the progress of the event.

tab4.question: What is a "Live Bet"?
tab4.answer: A Live Bet is a wager placed while the match is ongoing. Live betting is available for many sports such as football, basketball or tennis, offering you dynamic odds throughout the game.

tab5.question: What types of bets can I place?
tab5.answer: You can place different types of bets, including single bets, multiple bets, system bets or live bets. You can explore all available betting options under each sport for more information.

tab1.question: How do I place a bet in the Casino section?
tab1.answer: To place a bet in the Casino section, first access our platform and navigate to the Casino area. Select the game you want to play, open it, and choose the amount you wish to bet. Then, click the play button, and your bet will be placed automatically.

tab2.question: What game providers do you offer?
tab2.answer: In the Casino section, you can explore both the selection of games we offer and the list of providers available on our platform.

tab3.question: What are video slots?
tab3.answer: Video slots are modern versions of classic slot machines, offering a dynamic and interactive gaming experience. Unlike traditional slots, video slots incorporate advanced technologies that provide immersive themes, captivating animations, and exciting bonus features.

tab4.question: What is Live Casino?
tab4.answer: Live Casino is a special section that offers realistic casino experience, with games taking place in real time and hosted by professional live dealers. You can explore the wide variety of live casino games available in the "Live Casino" section.

deposit.description: You can deposit funds using NambaPay by selecting it as your payment method on the website and confirming the payment through the NambaPay app. Once the transaction is approved, the money will be credited to your account almost instantly.

Visit Casino Admiral and inform the operator that you want to top up your AdmiralBet account. You will need to provide your username and the amount you wish to deposit. You can find Casino Admiral on the 3rd floor of Sheraton Hotel in Bishkek.

withdrawal.description: Visit Casino Admiral and inform the operator that you want to withdraw funds from your AdmiralBet account. You will need to provide your username and the amount you wish to withdraw. You can find Casino Admiral on the 3rd floor of Sheraton Hotel in Bishkek.

tab1.question: How do I verify my account?
tab1.answer: By law you are only required to verify your account on first withdrawal or when you hit legally prescribed deposit limit.

tab1.question: Will I receive a Welcome bonus upon registration?
tab1.answer:
Upon registration, every new customer becomes eligible to participate in the Welcome offers available on our platform. The exact bonuses and conditions may vary over time, so we recommend checking the currently active promotions on our promotions page.
You can view all current promotions here: https://www.admiralbet.kg/promotions

tab2.question: Can I receive only one Welcome bonus?
tab2.answer:
Each customer can claim the Welcome Bonuses only once. All Welcome offers are limited to a single use per player, in accordance with our promotional terms.
For the latest available Welcome and other promotions, please visit: https://www.admiralbet.kg/promotions

tab3.question: What other bonuses are offered?
tab3.answer: Our platform provides a wide variety of bonuses, both for the Casino and Sports sections. To see which offers are available for your account, you can access the "My Bonuses" menu.

tab4.question: Are all offers deposit-based?
tab4.answer: Each promotion has its own rules and conditions for activation. It is also possible to receive non-deposit bonus offers.

tab5.question: Will I receive personalized bonus offers?
tab5.answer: Decisions regarding personalized bonus offers are made by our Bonus Department based on various factors. If your profile is eligible for such an offer, it will appear in the "My Bonuses" section.

tab6.question: Can I withdraw the amount from my active bonus?
tab6.answer: To withdraw the funds from your bonus balance, you must first meet the wagering requirements of the offer. Once these conditions are met, the bonus amount will be transferred to your real balance, after which you can request a withdrawal.

tab2.question: How do I make a deposit?
tab2.answer: Log in to our platform – AdmiralBet, then select the "Deposit" menu. Choose your preferred method and follow the described steps.

tab3.question: How do I request a withdrawal?
tab3.answer: To request a withdrawal, log in to our platform – AdmiralBet, then select the "Withdrawal" menu. Choose your preferred withdrawal method and follow the described steps.

tab4.question: Does my account need to be verified to request a withdrawal?
tab4.answer: Yes, your account must be fully verified to request a withdrawal.

tab5.question: How long do deposit and withdrawals take?
tab5.answer: Deposits are usually credited instantly to the gaming account, although slight delays may occur with deposits made via Bank Transfer or Debit/Credit Card. Withdrawals take between 2 to 5 business days for processing and approval, while Bank Transfer withdrawals may take between 2 to 10 business days.

tab7.question: What are the minimum and maximum amounts for deposits and withdrawals?
tab7.answer: Each method has individual limits for minimum and maximum deposits and withdrawals. All deposit limits are displayed once you select a specific deposit method. The same applies to withdrawals - you will see the available limits after choosing a withdrawal method.

tab8.question: Why was my deposit/withdrawal declined?
tab8.answer: There may be several reasons for a declined transaction such as insufficient funds, incorrectly entered details, or imposed restrictions. For more detailed information, please contact the customer support team.

tab9.question: Are there any fees for deposits and withdrawals?
tab9.answer: The organizer does not charge any fees for deposits or withdrawals. All transactions are free of fees on our side. Any fees that may apply will be charged by your bank.

tab1.question: How can I reset my password?
tab1.answer: If you have forgotten your password, you can use the "Forgot Password" option located below the "Login" button. You'll need to enter your email address, and the code will be sent to you, which you can use to reset your password.

tab2.question: Can I change the email address in my profile?
tab2.answer: Yes, you can change the email address linked to your gaming profile. To do so, you will need to contact our support center for assistance.

tab3.question: What should I do if a game does not load?
tab3.answer: If you are experiencing issues accessing a game on our platform, clear the cached memory of your device. If the problem persists, try accessing the game from another browser or device. If the issue is still not resolved, contact our support center for further assistance.

tab4.question: Is it possible for the funds in my account to disappear?
tab4.answer: Your account balance may change after you place a bet or request a withdrawal. If you suspect that someone else has access to your account, immediately change your password.

tab5.question: Can I play demo versions of the games?
tab5.answer: Yes, you have the option to access the demo version of each game to explore it and learn the rules before playing with real funds. The demo button is located next to the standard play button.

tab6.question: How can I contact the support team?
tab6.answer:
Our support team is available 24/7 on:
  • WhatsApp: https://wa.me/996880887788
  • E-mail: support@admiralbet.kg
  • Phone: +996 880 88 77 88

tab7.question: Where can I change the platform's language?
tab7.answer: At the bottom right corner of the site, you'll find a language selection button that allows you to choose your preferred language.
